description: Enterprise techniques used by Expand, ATT&CK software S0361 v1.0
name: Expand (S0361)

techniques.comment: Expand can be used to decompress a local or remote CAB file into an executable.[1]
Expand can be used to download or copy a file into an alternate data stream.[3]
Expand can be used to download or upload a file over a network share.[3]
